fees.description: For move-in customers to get a start read. At least 3 business days notice & meter access needed. Fee does not cover unlocking a plugged meter.
For move-out customers to get a final read. At least 3 business days notice & meter access required. No fee if you simply switch retailer.

gasContract.terms: This offer is for QLD residential customers. Please visit www.globirdenergy.com.au for full terms and conditions or call us on 133456. Note, step 1 is calculated by multiplying the daily allowance by the number of days in the billing period. For example, a daily allowance of 50 MJ /day and a 30-day billing period has a step 1 of 1500 MJ, or a 31-day 1550 MJ.

discounts.description: You will receive 1% discount off Usage & Supply charges when you pay your bill on-time by direct debit
You will receive 2% discount off Usage & Supply charges when you pay your bill on-time

gasContract.variation: We may update your solar feed-in, or your rates from time to time. We'll always notify you in writing prior to any change.

singleRate.description: Step 1 of 2494.17MJ per month assumes 365 days per year. Actual calculation based on an average of 82.00MJ per day.
Step 1 of 2494.17MJ per month assumes 365 days per year. Actual calculation based on an average of 82.00MJ per day.

gasContract.additionalFeeInformation: Additional fees and charges may apply, please see: https://www.globirdenergy.com.au/legal/fees/
